title: Pixel 4 and Uconnect
content:
Hello,
So my Pixel 4 will not connect to uconnect in my Jeep. The Pixel doesn't recognize the Jeep's bluetooth and vice versa. Has anyone else had this issue?  Any advice on how to get them to talk? 

Phone: Pixel 4
Jeep Wrangler Unlimited 2016. 
Uconnect Software: up to date as of 14 Dec 2019

Cheers to any help and advice.
